Eric Schmidt said Google had considered stopping indexing confidential cables released by WikiLeaks, but had decided to carry on. Some other U.S. organizations have bowed to government pressure to stop cooperating with the controversial site. Has Google looked at the appropriateness of indexing WikiLeaks? The answer is yes, and we decided to continue, he said. "Because it's legal." the company needed a more mature leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. "There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so Gabrielle Giffordsply involved and still run the business so brilliantly," Larry Page said.

Computers can intuit for people: Google chief London: In 50 years, computers will be able to intuit for people, Eric Schmidt , the chief of internet search engine giant Google, predicts. There will be a ubiquitous computational capability so amazing that people will assume that it is an assistant. It knows who you are, it knows what you do, it makes suggestions, it intuits things for you, Eric Schmidt told British daily the Telegraph. View result Eric Schmidt said that people who "opt in" to the system will begin experiencing a much richer relationship with technology, aided by their computerised "personal assistant

For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Franchise Tag Likely To Be Available For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Philadelphia Inquirer- The Eagles should be free to use their franchise tag on Michael Vick , despite labor uncertainty. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash, the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. The Eagles and Michael Vick have had casual discussions about such a deal, a source close to the situation said.
